name: Plain Bagel
description: A classic bagel with a chewy texture.

name: Everything Bagel
description: A flavorful bagel topped with a mix of seeds and spices.

name: Sesame Bagel
description: A bagel topped with sesame seeds for added flavor.

name: Poppy Seed Bagel
description: A bagel topped with poppy seeds for a unique taste.

name: Cinnamon Raisin Bagel
description: A sweet bagel with cinnamon swirls and raisins throughout.

name: Blueberry Bagel
description: A fruity bagel with blueberries mixed into the dough.

name: Onion Bagel
description: A savory bagel with onion flakes baked into the dough.

name: Garlic Bagel
description: A flavorful bagel infused with garlic for a bold taste.

name: Salt Bagel
description: A bagel topped with coarse salt for a savory crunch.

name: Pumpernickel Bagel
description: A dark and hearty bagel made with pumpernickel flour.

name: Whole Wheat Bagel
description: A nutritious bagel made with whole wheat flour.

name: Rye Bagel
description: A traditional bagel made with rye flour for a distinct flavor.

name: Cheddar Bagel
description: A savory bagel packed with sharp cheddar cheese.

name: Asiago Bagel
description: A cheese lover's delight, with Asiago cheese baked into the dough.

name: Jalapeno Bagel
description: A spicy bagel with bits of jalapeno pepper for a kick.
